title: The structural/extensive repairs to the existing buildings, which have been constructed with the approval from the competent authority or were in existence prior to17
clause_text: The structural/extensive repairs to the existing buildings, which have been constructed with the approval from the competent authority or were in existence prior to17.04.1964 in respect of residential structures and 01.04.1962 in respect of non-residential structures and which are in need of structural/extensive repairs, may be allowed without change in footprint/planning. Under the guise of repairs, addition/alterations/vertical & horizontal extension to the existing structures shall not be permissible. The structural /extensive repairs to the existing buildings may be allowed as described in Appendix IV. 60(A).Approvals of Building Permission on Fast Track based on Risk Based categorization

source_pdf.text_snippet: The structural/extensive repairs to the existing buildings, which have been constructed with the approval from the competent authority or were in existence prior to17.04.1964 in respect of residential
